channel.description: DNS and Time Sync DIY Labs Lab: Configure Chrony Install Chrony and mark the service for autostart on reboots. systemctl enable --now chronyd Edit the Chrony configuration file and comment all line entries that begin with “pool” or “server”. [root@server10 ~]# vim /etc/chrony.conf Go to the end of the file, and add a new line “server 127.127.1.0”. Start the Chrony service and run chronyc sources to confirm the binding.
